steps.name: I select the correct Zurich system from the dropdown list
I click on the next step
I select Yes to question 'Is third party Insured?'
I select No to do you know TP address
I select Yes to knowing TP vehicle reg
I enter the third party VRN "MK62UMU"
I click on the next step again
I select Yes to Ripe insurer
I click on the next step button again
I click on the submit button

name: Submit an LBA instruction
description:
As a portal user
  I want to provide all required information
  So I can submit an LBA Instruction
